name: harvest crochet pumpkins
notes:
what's autumn without some pumpkins? these lovable tributes to the real thing perfectly adorn any harvest table. they're easy to make in your choice of seasonal colours by caron simply soft. they're so perfect for the season, definitely make extras to showcase as playful accents on any autumn décor project.

sizing:
large pumpkin: approx 9" [23
cm] diameter x 5 ½" [14 cm] tall,
excluding stem.

medium pumpkin: approx 7"
[18 cm] diameter x 4" [10 cm] tall,
excluding stem.

small pumpkin: approx 4 ½" [11.5
cm] diameter x 3" [7.5 cm] tall,
excluding stem.
